html: Transgressions—The word here signifies sins of an high nature, such as wherein there is much of man's will against light: rebellious sins. Multiplied—They admit of no excuse; for they are acted before thee, and multiplied against thee, whereby thou art justly provoked to deny us all help. Testify—As so many witnesses produced proves our guilt. Are with us—Are still unforgiven. We know—We are convinced of them.
